S100CI:address.S100CI:administrativeArea: 3, rue de Varembe, PO Box 131 1211 Geneva 20 Switzerland

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The version of this route format

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Time this edition of route plan is edited

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Additional information for the status of the route

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoStatus
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Enumerated status value of the route

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoValidityStart
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Start of validity of route plan

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoValidityEnd
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: End of validity of route plan

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoDeparturePortID1
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Primary identifier for departure port given by UN/LOCODE

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoDeparturePortID2
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Secondary identifier for departure port given by free text string

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Reference to port call identifier in departing port

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoArrivalPortID1
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Primary identifier for arrival port given by UN/LOCODE

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoArrivalPortID2
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Secondary identifier for arrival port given by free text string

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoArrivalPortCall
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Reference to port call identifier in arriving port

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Engaged in dredging or underwater operations

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: 2-WIG 1-Carrying DG HS MP IMO Hazard Pollutant X(2)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: 4-HSC 3-Carrying DG HS MP IMO Hazard Pollutant Category Z(2)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Vessel with anti-pollution facilities and equipment

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Spare – for assignments to local vessels

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Spare 2– for assignments to local vessels
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Spare 2– for assignments to local vessels

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Medical transports (as defined in the 1949 Geneva Conventions and Additional Protocols)
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Medical transports (as defined in the 1949 Geneva Conventions and Additional Protocols)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Ships and aircraft of States not parties to an armed conflict
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Ships and aircraft of States not parties to an armed conflict

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: RouteInfoVesselHeight
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Vessel height measured from the keel to the masthead

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointExternalReferenceID
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: External reference information related to the waypoint

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointFixed
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Indicator if the route waypoint is fixed or editable

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegStarboardCL
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Starboard cross track distance check limit

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegPortCL
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Port cross track distance check limit

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegDraftMax
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Maximum draft of the route waypoint leg for all vessles

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegAirDraftMax
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Maximum air draft of the route waypoint leg for all vessels

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegBeamMax
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Maximum vessel beam of the route waypoint leg for all vessels

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegLengthMax
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Maximum vessel length of the route waypoint leg for all vessels

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegNote
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Note for the route waypoint leg

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeWaypointLegIssue
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Safety issue for the route waypoint leg

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleID
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Identifier of the schedule. This identifier is unique in the route

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementETD
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Planned or Recommended Time of departure represented by Estimated Time of departure

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementETA
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Planned or Recommended Time of arrival represented by Estimated time of arrival

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementETDWindowBefore
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Describes the period of time before planned or recommended time of departure

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementETDWindowAfter
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Describes the period of time after planned or recommended time of departure

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementETAWindowBefore
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Describes the period of time before planned or recommended time of arrival

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementETAWindowAfter
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Describes the period of time after planned or recommended time of arrival

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeScheduleElementNote
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Notes for the route schedule element

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeActionPointID
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Identifier of the action point. The identifier shall be unique in the route

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeActionPointExternalReference
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: External reference information related to the action point

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeActionPointRadius
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Distance from the action point within which action must be taken

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeActionPointTimetoAct
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Time before or after the action point

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeActionPointRequiredAction
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The action required for this action

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: routeActionPointRequiredActionDescription
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Human readable description of the action required for this action point
